title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.7 - Self-insurance report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.7 - Self-insurance report

State Regulations

Carrier's Name
SELF-INSURANCE REPORT
(Due on dates set forth in order.)
A. Attach a bank statement giving the balance
of the self-insurance fund as at the end of the prior calendar year. B. Financial statements

Image

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
508.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
